New Records: Adolis García set a record for RBI in a postseason series with 15
Key Match Events: García homered twice and drove in five runs
Texas Rangers reached their first World Series in 12 years
Rangers went 8-0 away from home in the playoffs
Pre-Game Insights: Rangers were underdogs entering the series
Rangers had a strong performance in the playoffs
Post-Match Reflections: Bruce Bochy became the first skipper to win a League Championship Series with three different teams
Astros were dethroned as defending World Series champions
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at Minute Maid Park
Rangers' road performance was key to their victory
